summary: This document consists of email correspondence between Paul Morris and Lesley Groff discussing their attempts to communicate with Jeffrey Epstein. The tone suggests that Epstein has been unresponsive or unavailable, and they are planning to reconnect the following week.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is reaching out to Lesley Groff regarding communication with Jeffrey Epstein, expressing concern about Epstein's unavailability.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is responding to Paul Morris about Jeffrey Epstein's lack of availability and suggests they may have better luck contacting him the following week.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual both Paul Morris and Lesley Groff are trying to reach, but he has been unresponsive.

connections.description: Paul Morris and Lesley Groff are communicating about their mutual concern regarding Jeffrey Epstein's unavailability.
Paul Morris is attempting to reach out to Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a level of familiarity.
Lesley Groff is also trying to facilitate communication with Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting she has a working relationship with him.

keyFacts: Paul Morris and Lesley Groff are trying to communicate with Jeffrey Epstein.
Epstein has been unresponsive to both individuals.
They plan to attempt contact again the following week.
